resources.string: Majority of options are disabled in demo version
Magic Fluids uses Android Color Picker library by yukuku (many thanks!) that is licensed under Apache License, Version 2.0. Click here to read the license
If you like it, consider rating it and buying full version. Your support will let us improve it and create even better applications in future!
For any comments, questions, suggestions or bug reports, please contact me at magicfluids@madscientist.pl
